text: The Exmoor pony is a breed of horse. It is native to the British Isles. ==Features== The fur is brown, from beige and brown to dark brown and black. The Exmoor pony eats grass and hay. It can be up to tall and weigh . The breeding time is 336 days. They can become 25 years old. Hannover Zoo: Exmoor Pony , viewed 2012-12-14 ==References== Category:Horse breeds
title: Exmoor pony
